items.text: short ball on middle, but Mahmudullah ducks under this. Umpire reckons it's too high

huge appeal for lbw! Not given, but Southee reviews. This is close. Full on middle stump, but ball straightens after pitching. Batsman misses the leg-side nudge and the ball hits his front leg. No bat on the replay, so we wait for ball tracking: ball's hitting 'leg stump', but it's on an 'umpire's call', so the batsman survives. NZ retain their review
full on middle, and Mahmudullah takes a big stride forward to defend
going short again. Back of a length on middle, and Mahmudullah ducks under this delivery
wild swing! Full on leg, and swinging further away from the right-hander. Latham, the keeper, dives to his left to intercept, but the ball has other plans
full outside off, and he comes down the wicket to smash a drive over cover. Misses the shot
full on off stump, and carefully defended off the front foot to point
items.postText: Scott: "Was Liton Das out even if he reviewed? " -- Yes

items.text: there's the first boundary! Length ball going across Mushi, and he slaps this over point for four
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: edged and goes just past Taylor at first slip! Length ball on middle, and Mushfiqur gloves this through the slip cordon! Mushfiqur's in some pain though. Time for the physio
items.postText: Arahiq: "No. Of overs , no. Of wickets and no of runs all three are competing hard here.."
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: beautiful line! Full on off, and just sneaking past the outside of off stump. Mushfiqur does well to cover his off stumps and shouldering his arms
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full, but wider outside off. Mushfiqur tries to slap this through the off side, but thick outside edge takes it to the third-man boundary
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full on middle, and worked away to the leg side
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and he defends off the back foot to end a big over
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle, and the ball swings into his pads. Misses the flick, and the ball hits his front leg. Impact outside leg stump though
full on middle, and he prods forward to defend towards mid-on
items.postText: Junaid: "This over is like boxing match mushi and boult exchanging punches. Goof stuff"

items.text: length ball on off, and Mahmudullah has no trouble in swiveling and pulling. Into the back-ward square boundary for six
length ball on off, and worked away to square leg for one
length ball, on the nagging off-stump line. Defended to the bowler
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, but going further down. Sharp take from Latham
nearly chops on. Length ball on off that he tries to cut. Under-edges the shot, but the ball just misses the stumps
items.shortText: Southee to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, and the extra bounce forces the batsman to duck
full on off stump, and he leans into a defensive shot. Played to cover
full on middle, and swinging inwards. Defended towards mid-on this time

items.preText: Sarat: "BD knew they will get beaten vs NZ, but never expected them to be this bad, last time whenthey toured, they were in winning position twice, "
items.text: leading edge! Falls short of point. Back of a length on off, and he tries to nudge it towards square leg. But the ball goes to the off side instead
